summary: FBI 302 report documenting an interview conducted on August 16, 2019, with an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) regarding Jeffrey Epstein's activities and cell location prior to his death. The inmate was interviewed about his own movements and Epstein's routine but had no information regarding Epstein's death.

persons.name: Margaret Girard
persons.context: Conducted the interview at MCC on August 16, 2019, regarding inmate observations and Epstein.

persons.name: Jose Charriez
persons.context: Conducted the interview at MCC on August 16, 2019, and is listed as the drafting agent of the 302 report.

persons.name: Davie Rodriguez
persons.context: Participated in the interview at MCC on August 16, 2019.

persons.name: Omar Daza
persons.context: Participated in the interview at MCC on August 16, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The deceased inmate at MCC. The interview sought information about his routine (being in legal from 9am-9pm) and cell location (L Tier, cell 220) prior to his death.

connections.description: Both FBI Special Agents who jointly conducted the inmate interview at MCC.
SA Charriez and TFO Rodriguez were part of the same interview team at MCC.
SA Charriez and OIG Investigator Daza were part of the same interview team at MCC.

events.title: Inmate Visit and Contraband Suspicion
events.description: An inmate (INMATE 3) received a visit from his girlfriend at MCC and was subsequently suspected of receiving contraband. He was placed in a 'dry room' for approximately 25 hours.

events.title: FBI Interview at MCC
events.description: FBI and OIG agents interviewed an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center regarding inmate movements and Jeffrey Epstein's activities prior to his death.

locations.name: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC)
locations.context: The federal jail in New York City where Jeffrey Epstein was housed and where the interviewed inmate was located. Address: 150 Park Row, New York, NY.

locations.name: L-TIER, Special Housing Unit
locations.context: A specific tier within the MCC's Special Housing Unit. Inmate 3 was housed in Cell 218 and Jeffrey Epstein was housed in Cell 220 on this tier.

locations.name: K tier, Cell 111
locations.context: The cell to which Inmate 3 was moved after his time in the 'dry room'.

locations.name: New York, New York
locations.context: Location of the MCC and where the investigation (File# 90A-NY-3151227) was conducted.

keyFacts: The document is an FBI 302 report from the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death, interviewing an inmate about the conditions and routine at MCC prior to the incident.
The interviewed inmate stated that Jeffrey Epstein would typically be 'in legal' from approximately 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM and was housed in cell 220 on L Tier.
The inmate explicitly stated he 'had no information regarding the death of EPSTEIN.'
The report details another inmate's (INMATE 3) disciplinary action for suspected contraband reception from a girlfriend's visit on August 9, 2019, involving 25 hours in a 'dry room'.
The interview was conducted by a multi-agency team including the FBI and the Office of the Inspector General (OIG) on August 16, 2019.
